Bio

Related

Stats

Biography

2021-22 All-RMAC honorable mention

2021-22: Played in all 29 games, starting 22, and averaged 13.1 points and 5.8 rebounds per game. ... Shot 42.1 percent from the field (147 of 349), 33.3 percent from 3-point range (17 of 51) and 81.0 percent at the free throw line (68 of 84). ... Third on the team in scoring, second in rebounding. ... Scored 21 points while making 9 of 12 from the field and also grabbed nine rebounds in a 75-68 win over Colorado Christian on Feb. 8. ... Recorded his fourth 20-point game -- his second in three games -- in a 78-76 loss to Chadron State on Jan. 28. ... Solid with 21 points and seven rebounds in a 67-64 loss at UCCS on Jan. 21. ... Had 15 points and seven rebounds to go with a career-high tying three steals in the 85-84 overtime win at Colorado Mesa on Jan. 14. ... Made 16 straight free throws dating back from Nov. 28 through Jan. 1. ... Averaged 18.3 points and 7.3 rebounds over three games from Dec. 18 through Jan. 1. ... Had 21 points added seven rebounds and two steals in a 94-84 win at CSU-Pueblo on Jan. 1. ... Dominated in 57-52 win over South Dakota Mines with a career-high 24 points and a career-best tying 14 rebounds. Sank 2 of 3 from 3-point range while making 9 of 19 overall from the field. ... Turned in his fifth double-double of the season with 10 points and 10 rebounds in an 82-68 loss at Western Colorado on Dec. 11. ... Had a double-double, his fourth of the season, with 11 points and 10 rebounds in 73-50 win over Colorado Mesa on Dec. 5. ... Ran his streak of double-doubles to three consecutive games with 15 points and 14 rebounds against San Francisco State on Nov. 20 and 22 points and 11 rebounds against Maine-Fort Kent on Nov. 23. ... Recorded a double-double of 19 points and 12 rebounds in 60-54 victory over Arkansas-Fort Smith on Nov. 14. ... Made his MSU Denver debut as a starter on Nov. 13, scoring 11 points in a 78-62 victory over Oklahoma Christian.

Before MSU Denver: Spent two seasons at Eastern Michigan, redshirting in 2019-20 before appearing in 16 games and making six starts for the Eagles. ... Averaged 6.7 points, 4.4 rebounds, and 20.9 minutes per game...Tallied six double-digit scoring performances and three double-doubles...Led the Eagles in rebounding three times...Had his first career double-double (with career highs of 13 points and 13 rebounds) against Adrian (Mich.) on Dec. 9. ... Went 5-for-8 from the field for for 13 points and added 10 rebounds and two blocked shots against Calvin (Mich.) on Jan. 14. ... Had 12 points and 11 rebounds at Central Michigan on Jan. 16. ... Scored 12 points and dished out a personal-best three assists at Kent State on Feb. 20. ... Played one of his two seasons for current MSU Denver assistant coach Jeremy Johnston at Northwest Tech College (Kan.), averaging 15.6 points per game for his career, including 19.2 per game as a sophomore, when he was an All-Kansas Jayhawk Community College Conference first team selection. ... Also averaged 7.9 rebounds per game for his career, including 8.1 as a sophomore. ... Had career highs of 30 points (twice) and 17 rebounds and career totals of 980 points and 498 rebounds. ... Made 35.6 percent from 3-point range (26 of 73) and 86.0 percent the free-throw line (141 of 164) in 32 games as a sophomore.

High School: Averaged 15.0 points per game at Millwood School. ... Averaged 16.4 points and 8.2 rebounds as a senior. ... Played in the 804 All-Star Game.

Personal: Born Miles J. Gibson. ... Son of Michael and Stephanie Gibson. ... Has a brother, Michael.
